author: alefisico
body:
#### PR description:

- Introduce a fix to nan values of QGL in nanoAOD.
- Adds to nanoAOD the UL16 PUID values for APV and non APV.
- Also includes a fix in JMEnano to propage UL16 PUID
- This PR should be tested on top of #33857 
- This PR will be backport to CMSSW_10_6_X right after

#### PR validation:

- Run the usual `runTheMatrix` and `scram build code-format` without errors.

FYI @camclean @singh-ramanpreet
title: Adding UL16 PUID and fixing QGL values in nanoAOD
